title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Knowledge Generation Based on Scientific Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of foundational science theories, understanding of research methodologies, and experience using digital simulation tools
context.additional_context: A program to enhance scientific modeling competencies through immersive learning experiences in a BYOD environment. Focuses on developing knowledge-generation skills for administrators/leaders to solve real-world business problems.

learning_goals: Learners can design simulation models to solve real-world business problems by applying core concepts of scientific modeling (variables, hypotheses, verification).
Learners can analyze modeling results using data visualization tools in a VR environment and write decision-making reports based on their findings.
Learners can improve their modeling approaches in three or more stages based on peer evaluations and simulation data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
